ability.title: Jump Start
ability.description: You start the race 2 spaces ahead of the starting line.

ability.title: Wealthy Sponsor
ability.description: You start the race with 4 guaranteed cards.

ability.title: Frontal Force Field
ability.description: You are immune to the Debris Hazard.

ability.title: Expert Racer
ability.description: You are immune to the Ramming Hazard.

ability.title: Nanite Repair Drones
ability.description: You are immune to the Mech Failure Hazard.

ability.title: Immaculate Engine
ability.description: You are immune  to the Sabotage Hazard.

ability.title: Heart of Gold
ability.description: You are immune to the Heart Attack Hazard.

ability.title: Gamblerâ€™s Fallacy
ability.description: Roll a d2 every turn, on a 2 your passive movement is 3, and on a 1 your passive movement is 0. While affected by a Hazard your passive movement is always 1.

ability.title: Marionette Circuit
ability.description: You can win the race even if you die.

ability.title: Daredevil
ability.description: On the first turn you are affected by the Debris Hazard, your passive movement is 3.

ability.title: Energy Siphon
ability.description: On the first turn you are affected by the Ramming Hazard, your passive movement is 3.

ability.title: Living on the Edge
ability.description: On the first turn you are affected by the Sabotage Hazard, your passive movement is 3.

ability.title: Escape Pod
ability.description: If you are killed, you can keep racing in your escape pod and you are immune to all Hazards until your next turn. While in the escape pod, your maximum hand size is 1.

ability.title: Trillwax
ability.description: You are immune to the Dazzle Hazard. If you are targeted by the Dazzle Hazard, the racer who played the card is affected by the Dazzle Hazard instead.

ability.title: Burnout Booster
ability.description: Play two movement cards this turn and reduce your maximum hand size to 7 cards.

ability.title: Scrambler
ability.description: Target another racer, they discard and redraw 4 random cards.

ability.title: Tactical Hacking
ability.description: Target another racer and pick 4 of your cards, trade those cards for 4 random cards in that racer's hand.

ability.title: Psionic Probe
ability.description: At the start of every turn you see the the hand of the lead (living) racer. If you are in the lead, you instead see the hand of the (living) racer in second place.

ability.title: Space Drafting
ability.description: Move forward until you are on the same space as the closest racer ahead of you.

ability.title: Precision Laser
ability.description: Target another racer and apply the **Pierced Engine** Hazard to them. Pierced engine can be removed with Tech Savvy. If Pierced engine is applied for 2 full turns, they will explode.

ability.title: Lucky Break
ability.description: Remove any hazard.

ability.title: Experimental Grav-Sling
ability.description: Attempt to switch position with the closest racer ahead of you. Roll a d10, if the result is less than 4, you explode.

ability.title: Recalibration
ability.description: Discard and redraw your whole hand.

ability.title: Seasoned Trickster
ability.description: Target 2 other racers, apply random Hazards to both of them.

ability.title: Core Synchronization
ability.description: Target another racer, if one of you dies the other also dies.
